short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension launcher for the SubFire Mini/Mobile players, a client for the Subsonic Media Streamer server.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension launcher for SubFire's Mobile/Mini player, version 2.  Now supports https protocol (right-click the icon to set the options). Now supports your choice of which SubFire player to use, including the early preview of the new TV version.

SubFire is an html5 music player for the Subsonic media player, which can be downloaded at http://subsonic.org/
